title: Prepare
content:
Prepare Weapon Actions Sacrifice 6m movement speed to deal an additional 4 Slashing damage with your melee weapon this turn. 1 turn Short Rest 6m Movement Speed

Sacrifice 6m movement speed to deal an additional 4 Slashing damage with your melee weapon this turn.

Prepare is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipmen
